titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University collection of The Medical Letter publication, 1996-2004
A Guide to the Rockefeller University collection of The Medical Letter publication, 1996-2004 FA1103A

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-01-01 05:03:10 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University collection of The Medical Letter publication

physdesc.extent: 99 record storage boxes and 4 letter document boxes

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 25 years old are open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: For additional Medical Letter materials open for research see:
FA241 Rockefeller University collection of the Medical Lettter publication

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contents includes: original manuscripts, reprints, advertising and package inserts, sources check, consultants drafts, manufacturers replies, and bibliography.
